00022 #include "dfsch/debug.h"
00023 #include <dfsch/dfsch.h>
00024 #include <dfsch/conditions.h>
00025 #include <stdio.h>
00026 
00027 static void debug_main(dfsch_object_t* condition){
00028   dfsch_object_t* restarts = dfsch_compute_restarts();
00029   char buf[512];
00030 
00031   fprintf(stderr, "debugger invoked on %s:\n",
00032           DFSCH_TYPE_OF(condition)->name);
00033   fprintf(stderr,"  %s\n", 
00034           dfsch_object_2_string(dfsch_condition_field_cstr(condition,
00035                                                      "message"),
00036                           10, 0));
00037 
00038   
00039   fprintf(stderr, "\nrestarts:\n");
00040   while (DFSCH_PAIR_P(restarts)){
00041     dfsch_object_t* restart = DFSCH_FAST_CAR(restarts);
00042     fprintf(stderr, "  [%s]: %s\n", 
00043             dfsch_object_2_string(dfsch_restart_name(restart), 1, 1),
00044             dfsch_restart_description(restart));
00045     restarts = DFSCH_FAST_CDR(restarts);
00046   }
00047   
00048   fprintf(stderr, "dbg> ");
00049   fgets(buf, 512, stdin);
00050   buf[strlen(buf)-1]='\0';
00051   dfsch_invoke_restart(dfsch_make_symbol(buf));
00052 
00053 }
00054 
00055 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(debug_handler, 0){
00056   dfsch_object_t* condition;
00057   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, condition);
00058   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00059   
00060   debug_main(condition);
00061 
00062   return NULL;
00063 }
00064 
00065 void dfsch_debug_register_handler(){
00066   dfsch_handler_bind(NULL, DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(debug_handler));
00067 }
